last_episode_to_air.name: Finale Results
last_episode_to_air.overview: Host Terry Crews reveals who America has chosen as the Season 19 winner in the two-hour finale featuring special guest performers.

name: America's Got Talent
overview: A weekly talent competition where an array of performers – from singers and dancers, to comedians and novelty acts – vie for a $1 million cash prize.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: In season 8, Sharon Osbourne leaves the show with Melanie Brown replacing her, and Heidi Klum becomes the new fourth judge.

seasons.name: Season 10
seasons.overview: In season 10. Howard Stern, Heidi Klum, Mel B and Howie Mandel return as judges, and Nick Cannon returns as host.

seasons.name: Season 11
seasons.overview: In season 11, Simon Cowell joins the judges panel alongside Heidi Klum, Mel B and Howie Mandel. Nick Cannon is back as host, and the series returns to Los Angeles this summer, with live shows broadcast from the famed Dolby Theatre.

seasons.name: Season 12
seasons.overview: On the heels of the most viewed season in five years, the 12th is back with creator and judge Simon Cowell, Mel B, Heidi Klum and Howie Mandel. Supermodel, entrepreneur and CEO Tyra Banks joins the team as host, and the series returns to Los Angeles with live shows from the famed Dolby Theatre.

seasons.name: Season 13
seasons.overview: After a record-breaking Season 12, Creator and Judge Simon Cowell returns alongside Mel B, Heidi Klum and Howie Mandel. Supermodel, entrepreneur and business CEO Tyra Banks joined the team last summer as host and melded effortlessly with the judges, bringing her unmistakable personal flair and verve to the show.

seasons.name: Season 14
seasons.overview: Creator and Executive Producer Simon Cowell returns to the judges' panel along with Howie Mandel. Also joining the panel this year are two fresh faces - award-winning actress, author and producer Gabrielle Union and Emmy Award-winning choreographer, actress, singer and dancer Julianne Hough. Terry Crews joins as host.

seasons.name: Season 15
seasons.overview: Creator and Executive Producer Simon Cowell is back at the star-studded judges' table with fan-favorite comedian Howie Mandel. Acclaimed actress and international superstar Sofia Vergara joins as a new judge this season alongside returning judge and global fashion icon Heidi Klum.  The dynamic Terry Crews returns as host.

episodes.name: Auditions 1
episodes.overview: A talent search from the producers of “American Idol” gets under way. Regis Philbin hosts as a variety of acts of all ages, including singers, dancers, comedians, acrobats, jugglers and more, compete for fame and a million-dollar grand prize. David Hasselhoff, Brandy and Piers Morgan make up the panel of judges.

episodes.name: Auditions 3
episodes.overview: The audition process continues, with David Hasselhoff, Brandy and Piers Morgan judging. Regis Philbin hosts.

episodes.name: Auditions 4
episodes.overview: The last round of tryouts. David Hasselhoff, Brandy and Piers Morgan serve as judges. Regis Philbin hosts.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 1
episodes.overview: The first of four semifinal rounds is featured. Two acts will move on to the finals---one chosen by celebrity judges David Hasselhoff, Brandy and Piers Morgan; the other by viewers. Regis Philbin hosts.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 1 - Results
episodes.overview: Voting results are revealed.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 2
episodes.overview: The second of four semifinal rounds finds acts vying for two more finalist spots to be determined by viewers and judges Brandy, David Hasselhoff and Piers Morgan. Regis Philbin is the host.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 2 - Results
episodes.overview: Voting results are revealed. Judges Brandy, David Hasselhoff and Piers Morgan offer their opinions on the act chosen by viewers to go to the finals.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 3
episodes.overview: Two more finalist spots are up for grabs as performers compete in the third of four semifinal rounds. Brandy, David Hasselhoff and Piers Morgan are the judges. Regis Philbin hosts.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 3 - Results
episodes.overview: Third-round voting results are revealed.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 4
episodes.overview: The fourth and final semifinal round. David Hasselhoff, Brandy and Piers Morgan serve as judges. Regis Philbin hosts.

episodes.name: Semi-Final 4 - Results
episodes.overview: Fourth-round voting results are revealed. Judges Brandy, David Hasselhoff and Piers Morgan offer their opinions on the act chosen by viewers to go to the finals. Also: the Hoff sings his new single, “Jump in My Car”; a performance from Cirque Du Soleil's “Zumanity”; and comedian Tom Green attempts to ride a skateboard through a ring of fire.

episodes.name: Wildcard Show
episodes.overview: A wild-card competition features 10 deserving but overlooked acts from the semifinals competing for two additional spots in next week's $1 million finale. Among the performers getting a second chance are: Nathan Burton; Leonid the Magnificent; All That; Natasha Le; Corina Brouder; Jessica Sanchez; Bobby Badfingers; N'Versity; Quick Change; and Alexis Jordan. Regis Philbin hosts.

episodes.name: Wildcard Show - Results
episodes.overview: Host Regis Philbin announces the viewer-selected winner of the wild-card round. Celebrity judges David Hasselhoff, Brandy and Piers Morgan offer their opinions. Also: Penn and Teller perform their magic act.

episodes.name: The Final
episodes.overview: The 10 remaining acts take the stage for their last performances before tomorrow night's finale, when the $1 million winner will be revealed. Celebrity guests on hand to offer the finalists pointers include Master P, Yolanda Adams, Chaka Khan, John Popper, and Penn and Teller. Regis Philbin hosts.

episodes.name: Winner Announced
episodes.overview: Season 1 of the talent show concludes with host Regis Philbin announcing which one of the 10 finalists viewers chose to win the $1 million prize. Judges Piers Morgan, Brandy and David Hasselhoff offer their opinions on the top act. Blue Man Group and singing duo Aly and AJ perform.

episodes.name: Dallas Auditions
episodes.overview: The Season 2 opener of the talent show, in which various entertainers compete for fame and a $1 million prize. Jerry Springer is the new host and Sharon Osbourne is a new judge, joining returning arbiters David Hasselhoff and Piers Morgan.

episodes.name: Los Angeles Auditions
episodes.overview: Talent-show hopefuls take part in the second round of auditions, judged by David Hasselhoff, Piers Morgan and Sharon Osbourne. Jerry Springer hosts.

episodes.name: Chicago Audition
episodes.overview: The third round of auditions. Jerry Springer hosts.

episodes.name: New York Audition
episodes.overview: The audition process continues. Jerry Springer hosts.

episodes.name: Las Vegas Callbacks, Part 1
episodes.overview: Part 1 of 2. The top acts from the four auditions return for the Las Vegas callbacks. Jerry Springer hosts.

episodes.name: Las Vegas Callbacks, Part 2
episodes.overview: Conclusion. The top acts from the four auditions return for the Las Vegas callbacks. Jerry Springer hosts.

episodes.overview: The Top 20 acts square off in the first week of performance shows.

episodes.name: Performance Episode #2
episodes.overview: The motley talent-show contestants showcase their skills in the second week of performances.

episodes.name: Performance Episode #3
episodes.overview: The Top 10 contestants showcase their talents in the third week of performances.

episodes.name: Final Eight
episodes.overview: The Top 10 acts are trimmed down to eight.

episodes.name: Final Performances
episodes.overview: In Part 1 of the two-part Season 2 finale, the remaining eight acts perform in a bid to win $1 million. They are then trimmed down to four.

episodes.name: Season Finale
episodes.overview: Conclusion. The second season ends with the announcement of the winner after the final four acts compete. Guest performers include Sean Kingston, Taylor Swift, the Muppets and UB40. In addition, arbiter David Hasselhoff is slated to perform.

episodes.name: The Finale & The Finals Results
episodes.overview: After an evening of exclusive celebratory entertainment, this season winner out of the remaining Top 5 is finally announced and awarded the million dollar grand prize and the Vegas contract of a lifetime

episodes.overview: The final performance episode features the 10 finalists in showcases.

episodes.name: Final Results
episodes.overview: The winning act is revealed in the Season 4 finale. The victor scores $1 million. Performers include "Britain's Got Talent" phenom Susan Boyle; pop songstress Shakira; English singer Leona Lewis; country's Rascal Flatts; and Cirque du Soleil.
